name: A Housewife's Guide to Toxic Tinctures
name_original: A Housewife's Guide to Toxic Tinctures
description:
Helen uncovers a curious plant and an abandoned lab in her greenhouse. Experiment with plant care and ingredients around your house while keeping up with all the demands of being a modern housewife in the 60's.

Instructions:

Click on items to know more about them.

Click and drag to make things interact with each other.
